issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Kitchensink -Listview -Under Append Items, Animation style 'Bottom' and 'Fade' do not work.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Fetch kitchensink from https://github.com/vishalduggal/KitchenSink.git listview_tests.
2. Go to Kitchensink > Base UI > View >ListView> Append Items.
3. Click on 'Start test' button.
4. Observe the screen. The items in the listview change with the specified animation style.
5. Observe the Animation style - 'Animation Bottom' and 'Animation Fade'.

Actual:
It does not show the bottom up and faded animations.

Expected:
It should show the bottom up and faded animations properly.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - ListView - Under Append Items, Animation style 'Bottom' and 'Fade' do not work.
fields.environment:
Tested with:
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130316201654
Studio: 3.0.2.201302191606
Device: iphone4S(v 5.1)
OS: OSX 10.7.5
